notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage density at and around the city of Yei, Nahr Yei district, Central Equatoria, South Sudan. Using satellite imagery acquired 05 March 2017, UNITAR - UNOSAT identified a total of about 6,300 destroyed structures within the area of the current map (approximately 700 square kilometers). Most of the damage is concentrated in the outskirts of the city. The whole analysis over the Nahr Yei district covers an area of approximately 3,640 square kilometers, and the results show over 18,300 destroyed structures. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
